question: When can i perform Qadha of Fajr Salaah
answer:
QUESTION

if i have missed Fajar with jamaat. what should be the priority to offer namaz -e-Fajar? In Makrroh timmings (that is just after the real time of Fajr) or after that time (when tha namaaz totaly called as QAZA. can you please tell me abouth tese timming in details

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful  

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh  

1. It is not permissible to perform any salat in the following three times:

·        At the time of sunrise

·        At the time of zawwaal

·        At the time of sunset

( Al-Hidaya, vol 1, pg 84, Shirkah Ilmiyya)

 

2. It is makruh to perform any nafl salat in the following two times:

·        After Subh Saadiq till sunrise

·        After the asr salat till sunset

 

However, it will be permissible to perform qaza(missed)salat in these times.(Al-Hidaya, vol 1, pg 85/86, Shirkah Ilmiyya / Aap ke Masaail, vol 2, pg 111)

 

3. If a person has missed his fajr salat with jama’h, he should perform it immediately as long as the sun has not risen. He should not wait for the salat to become qaza upon him.  

 

لا تجوز الصلاة عند طلوع الشمس ولا عند قيامها في الظهيرة ولا عند غروبها(الهداية) 

ويكره أن يتنفل بعد الفجر حتى تطلع الشمس وبعد العصر حتى تغرب لما روي أنه عليه الصلاة و السلام نهى عن ذلك ولا بأس بأن يصلى في هذين الوقتين الفوائت(الهداية) 

And Allah knows best
